steps.name:
Get the list of the 'Contacts', 'Specialists', 'Contributors', 'Used Resources' links "
                 (internal links) in the 'More' dropdown for an unauthorized user
Get the list of links on different levels of nesting in the Header for an unauthorized user
Click on internal links in the Header and thereby open corresponding web pages in the same tab

Get the list of the 'About', 'Registration', 'Logo' links (direct internal links) in the Header
                    for an unauthorized user
Get the list of links on different levels of nesting in the Header for an unauthorized user

Get the list of the 'Contacts', 'Specialists', 'Contributors', 'Used Resources' links "
                 (internal links) in the 'More' dropdown for an unauthorized user
Get the list of links on different levels of nesting in the Header for an unauthorized user
